newsitem.title: USA: Cardima Inc IPO range reduced - underwriter.
newsitem.headline: Cardima Inc IPO range reduced - underwriter.

text.p: The price range for Cardima Inc's initial public offering was reduced to 8 to 9 per share from 10 to 12 a share, said underwriter Bear, Stearns & Co.
The deal is expected to price 2.3 million shares June 6.
Cardima makes microcatherters that treat abnormal heart rhythms.
